title: Platform Features
description: Core features and functionality of MetaDJ Nexus platform

entries.title: Authentication System
entries.content: MetaDJ Nexus uses email-based authentication for user accounts. Users can sign up with an email and password, then log in to access the full platform experience. The landing page is public and shows platform highlights, while the main app at /app requires authentication. Account settings allow users to update their email and password. Administrative access is restricted to approved accounts and is not part of the public experience.

entries.title: Feedback System
entries.content: Users can submit feedback directly from the platform using the feedback button in the header (the message icon with a plus). The feedback form supports four types of submissions: Bug Reports for issues or errors encountered, Feature Requests for suggesting new functionality, Ideas for general suggestions and creative input, and General Feedback for any other comments. Bug reports include a severity rating from low to critical. All feedback is reviewed by Zuberant to help improve the platform.

entries.title: Admin Dashboard
entries.content: The admin dashboard provides administrators with tools to manage the platform, including reviewing feedback submissions, viewing usage analytics, and managing user accounts. Admin access is restricted to approved accounts and is not part of the public experience.

entries.title: Platform Views
entries.content: MetaDJ Nexus offers four main views: Hub is the home base for browsing music collections and featured content. Cinema provides an immersive visual experience with collection artwork and ambient visuals synced to music playback. Wisdom offers curated knowledge, guides, reflections, and creative philosophy. Journal is a private space for personal ideas and reflections. Users can switch between views using the navigation in the header.

entries.title: MetaDJai Assistant
entries.content: MetaDJai is the AI companion built into MetaDJ Nexus. MetaDJai can help users explore music collections, get recommendations based on mood or genre, learn about the MetaDJ philosophy and ecosystem, navigate platform features, and submit feedback about the platform. Users can open MetaDJai by clicking the MetaDJai button in the header or using the chat bubble on mobile.
